channel.title: [639] NPC Hit through prayer

item.title: [639] NPC Hit through prayer
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

You should make it an abstract boolean in Mob.java and in the Npc’s combat file under endSession, you need to add an if statement which has something like this
inside the parameters.

Idk what the boolean is for using prayer but I think it might have been that. Inside the if statement, don’t add anything.

Read full topic

item.title: [639] NPC Hit through prayer
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

On my 639 I am trying to make a specific NPC hit through prayer?
I found a line of code in NPC.java

public boolean hitsThroughPrayer() { return hitsThroughPrayer; }
Is this where I add it in?
If so what particularly do I add?

Read full topic
